favorites.title: Sonos announces ‘breakthrough’ Arc Ultra soundbar and Sub 4
favorites.description: The new $999 Sonos Arc Ultra offers even more immersive and more powerful audio than the original Arc thanks to the inclusion of the company’s Sound Motion technology.
favorites.content:

favorites.title: What Are Hall Effect Sensors and How Do They Work? (2024)
favorites.description: More and more keyboards and video game controllers employ Hall effect sensors, but what exactly is this technology? We break it down.
favorites.content: Hall effect sensors are everywhere right now. Keyboards, game controllers, and DIY kits use them for more precise inputs. But with any newly popular device, it can be easy to immediately jump onto th… [+2901 chars]
